price: 65. Iyagoo ku waaraya dhexdeeda waligood, ma heleyaan difaace iyo gargaare midna.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
